blocks.subject: Re: Bridal Shower
text: I'm Dana Davis.  A member of Veterans Memorial are you still sending
information/directions regarding Edith's bridal shower on Dec. 2nd?

raw_header: ---------------------- Forwarded by Dana Davis/HOU/ECT on 11/28/2000 04:05 PM

blocks.subject: Re: Bridal Shower
text: I'm resending this email because it appears that I am having problems
to my sisters email address. The address is kathy_d_lacy@reliantenergy.com.
If you care to respond, please remember to copy me as well  and I'm sure one
of us will get the information. For those of you who did receive this email
the first time please scroll down.
